last starbase (only starbase for now)
	actual location
		11,700 x 3,620
second starbase
		6,600 x 6,400
first starbase
		2,600 x 2,400

blockade ships 	x = 10,900
		y = 300 + 760*n
where n is the number of ships (1 to 10)

large asteroid
		12,800 x 7,200
